name: Black Island
description: Black Island is a classic adventure game with cinematic storytelling. Gather items, solve puzzles and throw yourself into the darkest of mysteries. If you are a lover of adventure games - Black Island is for you! This is the first part of Black Island. We plan to release sequels in the future.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 586 MB available space Additional Notes: The game will most likely also work on older Windows, such as XP, but it has not been tested.

reviews.review_text: Those videos looks promising he ? Well, the budget probably vanished in those because the rest of the game is ulgy as hell. The whole thing feels empty and unfinished. Sound is also not really well managed. There was probably a bunch of good ideas at first, killed by the lack of money or time ?  Eventually, there is an unfinished game.   Don't buy or you will keep encouraging those kind of authors to release unfinished products.

Interesting plot and nicely made. Still managed to enjoy it despite the fact that it took me less than an hour to beat the game. The puzzle are pretty simple and you don't actually need a guide to solve it because all the hints are right there. Overall 7.5/10 from me.
